field.name: productId
field.description: Shopify Product ID (used for both virtual and variant products)

field.name: assocs
field.description: For virtual products, a comma-separated list of associated variant product Shopify IDs. For variant products, it will be empty.

field.name: parentProductId
field.description: The Shopify Product ID of the parent product for variant products. For virtual products, it will be empty. It's kept separate from assocs to store the virtual product id as a String.

field.name: features
field.description: A List of selected options or features of the product (e.g., 1/Size/S, 1/Size/M, 1/Color/Red).

field.name: identifications
field.description: A map of identifying attributes such as 'id', 'sku', and 'barcode'.

field.name: metafields
field.description: Flattened metafield entries in the format "key/namespace/value", stored as a list.

field.name: productHash
field.description: SHA256 Hash representing the product’s core details (title, handle, image, gift card, etc.).

field.name: tags
field.description: Categorization or label tags of the product, flattened as key/value strings.

field.name: differenceMap
field.description: A complete diff of the product’s changed fields including tags, features, metafields, assocs, identifications, and nested differences in associated variants. Stored as JSON.
